pullrequest.title: Change queueing functionality such that segway queues a shell file containing the to-be-queued arguments, instead of queueing the arguments themselves

content.raw: Note that instead of passing the argument as a string (as it did when the arguments were 'gmtkEMtrain [params]', this passes the argument as a path (the paths to output files (those contained in the output/o/ directory) are also passed as a path, not a string)).
content.html: Note that instead of passing the argument as a string (as it did when the arguments were 'gmtkEMtrain [params]', this passes the argument as a path (the paths to output files (those contained in the output/o/ directory) are also passed as a path, not a string)).
